H0.text: How many 'Oscars' did the film 'Slumdog Millionaire' win. 5

H1.text: How many 'Oscars' did the film 'Slumdog Millionaire' win. 10

H2.text: How many 'Oscars' did the film 'Slumdog Millionaire' win. 3

H3.text: How many 'Oscars' did the film 'Slumdog Millionaire' win. 8

A4.text: On 22 February 2009, the film won eight out of ten Academy Awards for which it was nominated, including Best Picture and Best Director.

A5.text: It was nominated for 10 Academy Awards in 2009 and won 8—the most of any 2008 film—including Best Picture, Best Director, and Best Adapted Screenplay.
